📖 My Books 📖

This page contains a list of the books I have published or merely written. Please click any of the books’ titles (that which is surrounded by a border with a red bar on the left) to view more information about it.

  • John’s Revelation — A Modern Annotated Translation

    • Description: My translation of the Revelation of John written in a modern style with a contemporary book design. Ideal for newcomers to the Bible.
    Published: 15 February 2022
    ISBN: 978-3-7557-9152-2

  • The Apocalypse of John — A Modern Illustrated Translation with Notes and the Original Greek Text

    • Description: My translation of the Apocalypse (or Revelation) of John written in a modern style and with pictures and paintings following every chapter and the original Greek text.
    Published: 10 August 2021
    ISBN: 978-3-7543-2897-2

  • The Intricacies of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglpyhics

    • Description: A book for learning the basics of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphs for people with absolutely no linguistic background; teaches the basics in an accessible manner.
    Published: 16 May 2020
    ISBN: 978-3-752952-49-0
